text: juyeo dangsinkkeseo jeoege him-euljusyeossgo sageon-ui haemyeong-eul galeuchyeo ju syeoss-eumyeo cheonjichangjoleul hasyeoss-euni dangsin iyamallo hyeonsewa naese-ui ju-in-isib nida jeohuiga museullim-eulosseo saeng-eul machige hayeo jusoseo geuligo jeoleul jeong-uiwa hamkke issdolog hayeo jusoseo
